content:
我希望你能帮我在我电脑的alias设置，在任何terminal终端我输入 gemi_claude 会自动变成输入和执行[Pasted ~3 lines] 这几行命令export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="sk-antigravity"
export ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL="http://127.0.0.1:8045"
claude

tool_input.description: Check for common shell configuration files
Check for common shell configuration files

tool_output.output:
-rw-r--r--     1 fanshengxia  staff       1365 Apr  7  2025 .bash_profile
-rw-r--r--@    1 fanshengxia  staff       1787 Jan  9 13:08 .zshrc
tool_output.description: Check for common shell configuration files

tool_output.preview:
# >>> conda initialize >>>
# !! Contents within this block are managed by 'conda init' !!
__conda_setup="$('/Users/fanshengxia/opt/anaconda3/bin/conda' 'shell.zsh' 'hook' 2> /dev/null)"
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    eval "$__conda_setup"
else
    if [ -f "/Users/fanshengxia/opt/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh" ]; then
        . "/Users/fanshengxia/opt/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh"
    else
        export PATH="/Users/fanshengxia/opt/anaconda3/bin:$PATH"
    fi
fi
unset __conda_setup
# <<< conda initialize <<<

export PATH="/usr/local/bin:$PATH"
export PATH="/usr/local/bin:$PATH"
export RQSDK_LICENSE=tcp://license:SXF4jz91bGBpFOPY5BIycxRQHOML4u4k069mhLmeDvlZN6Nv0oqEJ_kGoejOnkaFMTOEQAAaRvu5-Xk4v9Mf8_lnKktX5vJqqaSWsHjU9D1mSi1mxcTL3sqfWgX-vCzIxeCCukipK37UB8OjzyJdoPbAZB6Gn5Pw8iuK7t5HRjU=MOeqFY1Yyo1jYyc-hOqYxN-4uzHkfbcDyzzWQMQj4QDKUZMa5O26rHgk8VnMnFBMlPe0JsfWjKrxwBTvOSXNB9sJNisO3zSd87Otq9-i0OWZFvgnnnMFvFbm9Ird8Tqe6iHMPQf7ddqmqan675ccRyeZ5NmFNQL2WUx4_vH9gQE=@rqdatad-pro.ricequant.com:16011 
export RQDATAC_CONF=tcp://license:SXF4jz91bGBpFOPY5BIycxRQHOML4u4k069mhLmeDvlZN6Nv0oqEJ_kGoejOnkaFMTOEQAAaRvu5-Xk4v9Mf8_lnKktX5vJqqaSWsHjU9D1mSi1mxcTL3sqfWgX-vCzIxeCCukipK37UB8OjzyJdoPbAZB6Gn5Pw8iuK7t5HRjU=MOeqFY1Yyo1jYyc-hOqYxN-4uzHkfbcDyzzWQMQj4QDKUZMa5O26rHgk8VnMnFBMlPe0JsfWjKrxwBTvOSXNB9sJNisO3zSd87Otq9-i0OWZFvgnnnMFvFbm9Ird8Tqe6iHMPQf7ddqmqan675ccRyeZ5NmFNQL2WUx4_vH9gQE=@rqdatad-pro.ricequant.com:16011

tool_input.newString:
export PATH="$HOME/.npm-global/bin:$PATH"

alias gemi_claude='export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="sk-antigravity"; export ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL="http://127.0.0.1:8045"; claude'

export PATH="$HOME/.npm-global/bin:$PATH"

alias gemi_claude='export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="sk-antigravity"; export ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL="http://127.0.0.1:8045"; claude'

tool_output.diff:
Index: /Users/fanshengxia/.zshrc
===================================================================
--- /Users/fanshengxia/.zshrc
+++ /Users/fanshengxia/.zshrc
@@ -28,4 +28,7 @@
 
 # Added by Antigravity
 export PATH="/Users/fanshengxia/.antigravity/antigravity/bin:$PATH"
 export PATH="$HOME/.npm-global/bin:$PATH"
+
+alias gemi_claude='export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="sk-antigravity"; export ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL="http://127.0.0.1:8045"; claude'
+
